title: Senate Faults Google, Other Tech Giants for Role in Russian Election Meddling
text:
A Senate investigation of Russia’s social-media influence criticized U.S. tech giants, with new attention on Google and YouTube, for helping spread misinformation during the 2016 presidential election and pushed them to better coordinate to prevent a repeat next year.

The Senate Intelligence Committee report released Tuesday, which bolsters previous investigations of Russian interference, recommends the Trump administration publicly underscore the danger of further outside meddling in 2020, and warns political campaigns to...
description: A Senate investigation of Russia’s social-media influence criticized U.S. tech giants, with new attention on Google and YouTube, for helping spread misinformation during the 2016 presidential election and pushed them to better coordinate to prevent a repeat next year.
